ucenterMenuGetById: select * from t_ucenter_menu where id=? and del_tag='0'
ucenterMenuAdd: insert into t_ucenter_menu(id, ucenter_menu_parent, ucenter_menu_sn, ucenter_menu_title, ucenter_menu_url, cdate, cuser_id, cuser_name, udate, uuser_id, uuser_name, del_tag) values(null, ?, ?, ?, ?, now(), ?, ?, now(), ?, ?, '0')
ucenterMenuEdit: update t_ucenter_menu set ucenter_menu_parent=?, ucenter_menu_sn=?, ucenter_menu_title=?, ucenter_menu_url=?, udate=now(), uuser_id=?, uuser_name=? where id=? and del_tag='0'
ucenterMenuDel: update t_ucenter_menu set del_tag='1' where id in (?)
ucenterMenuListCount: SELECT count(*) tcount FROM t_ucenter_menu t WHERE t.del_tag='0'
ucenterMenuListQuery: SELECT * FROM t_ucenter_menu t WHERE t.del_tag='0'
